div.div: Arizona Christian vs. Sul Ross St.

tr.td: ACU won coin flip and will defer. SRSU will defend west end zone.
Derek Brush kickoff 65 yards to the SRSU00, Jermaine Steven return 22 yards to the SRSU22 (Robert Harding).
Sul Ross St. drive start at 15:00.
James Davis pass incomplete to Jeremy Reed.
Andre Wilson rush for 5 yards to the SRSU27 (Chris Oatman).
Adrion Smith rush for no gain to the SRSU27 (Jared Landseade).
James Davis pass complete to Trelen Norton for 5 yards to the SRSU32 (Austin Schleier).
James Davis pass complete to Jeremy Shelley for 7 yards to the SRSU39 (Gary Stevenson).
